title: Stuck repeating same `Processing block` during initial sync
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description The beacon node appears to be stuck in a loop `Processing block` during initial sync. It keeps logging these same logs indefinitely. ```sh [2022-09-02 00:45:39] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x0835116f... 4604544/4604626 - estimated time remaining 7s blocksPerSecond=10.4 peers=43 [2022-09-02 00:45:39] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x1fbe5fcb... 4604576/4604626 - estimated time remaining 4s blocksPerSecond=12.0 peers=43 [2022-09-02 00:45:41] ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=method not found [2022-09-02 00:45:43] WARN initial-sync: Block is not processed error=could not process block: could not execute state transition: could not validate state root, wanted: 0x6875863192f77936122042fa5154841d463cf97b7f65fe891d3fd16d419476cf, received: 0x23d270776a2635a7b1391330d4f7b2e4410bf55ebddf9702c418bb91a8c28145 [2022-09-02 00:45:43] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x0835116f... 4604544/4604626 - estimated time remaining 7s blocksPerSecond=10.4 peers=43 [2022-09-02 00:45:43] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x1fbe5fcb... 4604576/4604626 - estimated time remaining 4s blocksPerSecond=12.0 peers=43 [2022-09-02 00:45:48] WARN initial-sync: Block is not processed error=could not process block: could not execute state transition: could not validate state root, wanted: 0x6875863192f77936122042fa5154841d463cf97b7f65fe891d3fd16d419476cf, received: 0x23d270776a2635a7b1391330d4f7b2e4410bf55ebddf9702c418bb91a8c28145 [2022-09-02 00:45:48] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x0835116f... 4604544/4604627 - estimated time remaining 7s blocksPerSecond=10.4 peers=42 [2022-09-02 00:45:48] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x1fbe5fcb... 4604576/4604627 - estimated time remaining 4s blocksPerSecond=12.0 peers=42 [2022-09-02 00:45:51] ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=method not found [2022-09-02 00:45:52] WARN initial-sync: Block is not processed error=could not process block: could not execute state transition: could not validate state root, wanted: 0x6875863192f77936122042fa5154841d463cf97b7f65fe891d3fd16d419476cf, received: 0x23d270776a2635a7b1391330d4f7b2e4410bf55ebddf9702c418bb91a8c28145 [2022-09-02 00:45:52] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x0835116f... 4604544/4604627 - estimated time remaining 7s blocksPerSecond=10.4 peers=43 [2022-09-02 00:45:52] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x1fbe5fcb... 4604576/4604627 - estimated time remaining 4s blocksPerSecond=12.0 peers=43 [2022-09-02 00:45:57] WARN initial-sync: Block is not processed error=could not process block: could not execute state transition: could not validate state root, wanted: 0x6875863192f77936122042fa5154841d463cf97b7f65fe891d3fd16d419476cf, received: 0x23d270776a2635a7b1391330d4f7b2e4410bf55ebddf9702c418bb91a8c28145 [2022-09-02 00:45:57] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x0835116f... 4604544/4604627 - estimated time remaining 6s blocksPerSecond=13.6 peers=45 [2022-09-02 00:45:57] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x1fbe5fcb... 4604576/4604627 - estimated time remaining 3s blocksPerSecond=15.2 peers=45 [2022-09-02 00:46:01] ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=method not found [2022-09-02 00:46:02] WARN initial-sync: Block is not processed error=could not process block: could not execute state transition: could not validate state root, wanted: 0x6875863192f77936122042fa5154841d463cf97b7f65fe891d3fd16d419476cf, received: 0x23d270776a2635a7b1391330d4f7b2e4410bf55ebddf9702c418bb91a8c28145 [2022-09-02 00:46:02] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x0835116f... 4604544/4604628 - estimated time remaining 6s blocksPerSecond=13.6 peers=47 [2022-09-02 00:46:02] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x1fbe5fcb... 4604576/4604628 - estimated time remaining 3s blocksPerSecond=15.2 peers=47 [2022-09-02 00:46:06] INFO p2p: Peer summary activePeers=47 inbound=0 outbound=47 [2022-09-02 00:46:09] WARN initial-sync: Block is not processed error=could not process block: could not execute state transition: could not validate state root, wanted: 0x6875863192f77936122042fa5154841d463cf97b7f65fe891d3fd16d419476cf, received: 0x23d270776a2635a7b1391330d4f7b2e4410bf55ebddf9702c418bb91a8c28145 [2022-09-02 00:46:09] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x0835116f... 4604544/4604628 - estimated time remaining 8s blocksPerSecond=10.4 peers=47 [2022-09-02 00:46:09] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x1fbe5fcb... 4604576/4604628 - estimated time remaining 4s blocksPerSecond=12.0 peers=47 [2022-09-02 00:46:11] ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=method not found [2022-09-02 00:46:13] WARN initial-sync: Block is not processed error=could not process block: could not execute state transition: could not validate state root, wanted: 0x6875863192f77936122042fa5154841d463cf97b7f65fe891d3fd16d419476cf, received: 0x23d270776a2635a7b1391330d4f7b2e4410bf55ebddf9702c418bb91a8c28145 [2022-09-02 00:46:13] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x0835116f... 4604544/4604629 - estimated time remaining 8s blocksPerSecond=10.4 peers=46 [2022-09-02 00:46:13] INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0x1fbe5fcb... 4604576/4604629 - estimated time remaining 4s blocksPerSecond=12.0 peers=46 ``` ### Has this worked before in a previous version? Yes, from a few weeks ago. ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction ```sh docker run \ --name beacon \ -it \ -d \ --restart=unless-stopped \ --log-driver local \ --log-opt max-size=2gb \ -p 4000:4000 \ -p 13000:13000 \ -p 12000:12000/udp \ -p 3500:3500 \ -v $HOME/.eth2_beacon_chain_data:/data \ -v /home/validator/go/src/github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/cmd/prysmctl:/checkpoint_data \ gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain:stable \ --datadir=/data \ --rpc-host=0.0.0.0 \ --grpc-gateway-host=0.0.0.0 \ --monitoring-host=0.0.0.0 \ --enable-debug-rpc-endpoints \ --grpc-max-msg-size=65568081 \ --accept-terms-of-use \ --checkpoint-block=/checkpoint_data/block_mainnet_altair_4587648-0xafb6aa13924503b4983eab2463448c2369f70b4f68dc4f18a322c60f203322fc.ssz \ --checkpoint-state=/checkpoint_data/state_mainnet_altair_4587648-0x507a220482ff12f45e6e43621a685451eed095ab1337409e332345d6716577eb.ssz \ --http-web3provider="$ETH1_PROVIDER" ``` ## üî• Error 

[2022-09-02 00:52:36]  WARN initial-sync: Block is not processed error=could not process block: could not execute state transition: could not validate state root, wanted: 0x6875863192f77936122042fa5154841d463cf97b7f65fe891d3fd16d419476cf, received: 0x23d270776a2635a7b1391330d4f7b2e4410bf55ebddf9702c418bb91a8c28145
## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** 
  
Linux intelnuc 5.19.1-arch2-1 #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Thu, 11 Aug 2022 16:06:13 +0000 x86_64 GNU/Linux
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** 
  
REPOSITORY                                TAG       IMAGE ID       CREATED       SIZE
gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain   stable    6ea5cb3b5d8a   10 days ago   125MB
**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?**
@miguelmota Are you constantly stuck here ? Even after restarts
If you're stuck on restarts, is it always in the same block?
@miguelmota Can you paste add in `--verbosity=debug` to prysm and paste all the logs you see from your node ?
Also do you have all your previous logs ? Ex: Logs of prysm until it hit this issue

@nisdas sadly I don't have the logs anymore but it's possible it's related to the bad memory issues (https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/issues/11405). I'll report back if I see the same behavior after a resync
